title: Insight Vacations Continues Its "Insight Bonus Points" Program
text:
Learning & Support Insight Vacations Continues Its "Insight Bonus Points" Program With the launch of over 150 handcrafted itineraries spanning the globe, agents will now have more inspiration to help check off their clients' bucket lists October 19, 2015 14:04 ET | Source: The Travel Corporation Canada 
TORONTO, Oct. 19,   Insight Vacations ( http://www.insightvacations.com ), the leader in premium and luxury escorted journeys, is reminding agents about its "Insight Bonus Points" program, allowing them to collect points which they can redeem to experience an Insight journey on the company. Having recently launched over 150 outstanding itineraries from its three new programs, 2016-17 Europe & Britain, 2016-17 Americas and the truly exceptional Luxury Gold collection, agents now have a cornucopia of journeys to choose from that will inspire their clients to travel. For every Insight Vacations booking, agents will earn one Insight Bonus Point. Five points will allow agents to save 10% off an Insight journey, while 15 points will offer a 30% savings. Once agents collect 25 points, a free Insight trip will be redeemable when agents combine the 50% offer and their 50% Agent Discount. Every Insight Bonus Point is worth an additional 2% reduction from the confirmed Travel agent discount, and agents can accumulate their points for up to three years. 
"Our Insight Bonus Points program is tool that that will reward our wonderful and loyal agents with an experience of a lifetime, on us!" said Cris David, president, Insight Vacations Canada. "With over 150 itineraries from our three newly launched collections, clients now have more reasons to travel with Insight Vacations." 
One collection that will surely spur wanderlust among clients and agents alike is the newly launched Luxury Gold program by Insight Vacations. This all-new collection is in a class of its own featuring over 30 outstanding itineraries in Europe, India, Bhutan, Nepal, North America and South America. From travelling first class on the beautiful Glacier Express as an Exclusive Insight , to taking part in an authentic Greek Souvlaki Party as part of the its Epicurean Dining experience, Luxury Gold is the ultimate way to travel. Clients can take advantage of Insight Vacations' Early Payment Discount offer by saving up to $1,936 per couple* if they pay in full before November 19, 2015 (USA & Canada Luxury Gold itineraries) or January 14, 2016 (European Luxury Gold itineraries). 
Below is a glimpse into three new outstanding itineraries from the Luxury Gold by Insight Vacations program: 
Jewels of the Aegean - first departure on April 29 th , 2016 Welcome to the land of ancient gods and legendary lifestyles. With the new 10-day Jewels of the Aegean itinerary, Insight expertly combines the wonder of the ancient Greeks, the flavour of the idyllic Aegean Islands, and the attention to detail that defines every Luxury Gold vacation to create an experience of Homeric proportions. Guests sail across crystalline Mediterranean waters to track down the birthplace of Apollo. They will enjoy an Epicurean Dining experience by savouring Michelin-starred cuisine in the shadow of timeless ruins and collect their stars at the exquisite Varoulko Restaurant overlooking the Mikrolimano Marina. Guests will traipse along the rim of Santorini's caldera to arrive in the vibrant heart of Fira. At the Grande Bretange Hotel Athens, a truly exceptional Luxury Gold property , guests are offered breathtaking views of the fabled Acropolis, regal Syntagma Square and the Parliament. The Jewels of the Aegean itinerary brings clients' personal epic to life with an unforgettable series of destinations, excursions and culinary triumphs designed to please gods and mortals alike. 
Harmony of Central Europe - first departure on May 1 st , 2016 From the beginning, the 14-day Harmony of Central Europe Luxury Gold itinerary brings every element of guests' ideal vacation into perfect harmony. After walking in the steps of a 6-year-old Mozart at a specially arranged, out-of-hours Exclusive Insight visit to the glittering Schönbrunn Palace, clients take their seats for a Michelin-starred meal that is a virtuosic performance all its own. They will savour every note of their delicious Epicurean Dining experiences as the First Strudel House of Pest gives way to a private champagne cruise on the 'blue' Danube. Not to be outdone, guests will experience an exclusive, private Chopin recital before celebrating the culmination of their tour with a Celebration Dinner featuring a fine selection of local dishes and wine at a beautiful local restaurant in Warsaw. Guests will be met with truly exceptional hotels along the way, such as the five-star Boscolo hotel in Budapest, offering old-style prestige and elegant interior design. It features the New York Café, considered to be 'the best café in the world' and the Salon Fine Dining Restaurant. 
Majestic Switzerland - first departure on June 17 th , 2016 Winding high among the world-famous peaks of the Swiss Alps, the 10-day Majestic Switzerland itinerary is designed to provide a breathtakingly elevated experience both literally and figuratively. In St. Moritz, guests take in an Exclusive Insight by joining a nature guide for a mountain stroll, taking in scenic views and spectacular mountain scenery. Here, idyllic alpine passes, a Michelin-starred meal at the chic Seerestaurant Belvédère as an Epicurean Dining experience, and perhaps the highest expression of both cheese and chocolate in Broc and Montreux, meet the lofty standards for quality and service that are the hallmark of a Luxury Gold vacation. Guests will also be treated to stays at some of Switzerland's most exceptional hotels including The Kempinski Grand Hotel des Bains in St. Moritz and The Mont Cervin hotel in Zermatt, offering fantastic facilities such as their various gourmet restaurants and a spa. Clients will enjoy all of the advantages of Insight as they are taken above and beyond in Majestic Switzerland. 
For more information, please contact your local Sales Manager, visit www.insightluxurygold.com , or contact an Insight Specialist at the National Sales Centre at 1-800-387-8490. About Insight Vacations For more than 38 years, Insight Vacations ( www.insightvacations.com ) has been designing the world's finest escorted travel itineraries. As the experts in Europe, Insight offers over 100 journeys across the continent, covering more of Europe than any other operator. Insight Vacations also offers the same legendary high standards and carefully curated itineraries in North America, South America, India, Bhutan, Nepal, Morocco, Egypt and Israel. Luxury Gold by Insight Vacations is an exclusive collection of unique journeys that elevate travel beyond the ordinary at every moment. Guests travelling with Luxury Gold stay at the finest hotels, dine on the epicurean regional cuisine at featured Michelin-starred restaurants and enjoy an unmatched collection of once-in-a-lifetime experiences and sightseeing. All Insight itineraries are expertly designed for smaller groups of average 28 guests with a maximum of just 40. Each tour includes the services of an experienced Tour Director who acts as 'travelling concierge,' and Signature Experiences that provide a unique and revealing look into the history and culture of each destination. The authentic flavours of each country are celebrated through included Signature Dining experiences, Insight hotels are handpicked for their high quality and desirable central or scenic locations and the Insight Wi-Fi equipped motorcoach is specially customised to provide Business Class legroom. With the perfect balance of guided and independent exploration Insight has reimagined vacations to truly escape from the ordinary. 
For more information, visit us at http://www.insightvacations.com , on social media at http://www.facebook.com/InsightVacations , http://twitter.com/InsightVacation , and join the conversation using the hashtag #InsightMoments. About TreadRight Created as a joint initiative between The Travel Corporation's family of brands, the TreadRight Foundation is a not-for-profit working to ensure the environment and communities we visit remain vibrant for generations to come. To date, TreadRight has supported more than 35 sustainable tourism projects worldwide. The Foundation's guiding principle is to encourage sustainable tourism development through conservation, leadership and support for communities. Foundation priorities are set by the Steering Committee, which includes sustainability leaders like Céline Cousteau and Costas Christ. TreadRight's past project partners include WWF, Conservation International and The National Trust in the UK. Current initiatives include sponsoring the National Geographic Society's inaugural "World Legacy Awards," and inspiring wildlife advocates like Terri Irwin. To learn more about our past and current work at TreadRight, please visit us at treadright.org. - ENDS - Terms & Conditions: Bonus points are valid for a maximum of 3 years. Bonus points are applicable to Travel Agents ONLY. These points are applicable on group bookings excluding custom tours. These points are NOT valid for redemption on tours to Turkey, Israel, Egypt, Morocco, Jordan, Greece, Independent Breaks/Mini Trips or tours with cruise inclusions. Bonus points can only be redeemed on the land portion of the tour package. Bonus point bookings are not transferable or combinable with the Tour Specialist free trip redemption. Bonus point coupons need to be faxed to 416-482-4307 or emailed to travelagentdiscount@insightvacations.com for redemption. The 'travel agent discount' is subject to availability and the discount amount is at the sole discretion of Insight Vacations up to a maximum of 50% for any given tour. 
* Applies only to trips featuring the "Early Payment Discount" in the price panel. Applies to the Land-only portion of your holiday. For discounts to apply, trips must be paid in full by designated date and not less than 45 days before the tour departs. For departures marked with an asterisk * discount as per the 2015 brochure.
